Perfect for rockhounds of all ages!  â¶ This is the ORIGINAL and the ONLY VERSION of Crystal Guide that we produce for Android - please beware of imitators using our app name and trademarks!  Our extensive database of crystals has been built from years of research and consultations, it's our pride and joy.FEATURES:â   Huge A-Z list of crystals, gemstones and minerals, each with its own image and complete geological / metaphysical information.â   Contains hundreds of highly detailed crystal profiles, covering a searchable index of over 2000 common names!â   Search or browse for gemstones by name, geological properties, mental/physical/spiritual ailments and areas of improvement, colours, numerology and chakras.â   Extensive crystal healing information is available, as well as gem elixir advisories and numerology data.â   Astral stones / birthstones and zodiac information (by month and by star sign).â   Geological & chakra reference charts.â   Per profile note-taking facility.â   Directly compare gemstone profiles.â   Free database / profile updates.â   Supports both phones and tablets.â   Supports App2SD and Move To SD (android 2.2+).â   No ads, no intrusive permissions, just a clean fast crystals app.â   If metaphysical/healing info is not for you, we provide an option to disable it (in settings).â   Priced very keenly for a professional reference, just a cup of coffee!Ideal for gem stone and mineral collectors, crystal healing, meditation, spiritual healing, crystal bible owners, psychics, geologists and rock hounds alike.â¶ We support our apps. If you run in to a problem, please visit our website at www.markstevens.co.uk where we have support articles and FAQ's. reviews.title: \342\231\245 We Love This App! \342\231\245
reviews.comment: Accent On Nature is a Brick & Mortar Store in Columbus Ohio specializing in Rocks, Crystals, Gemstones, Meteorites, Fossils, Sea Shells, Jewelry, Gifts & Much More, We have often had people ask us for a good mobile app for Crystals and Stones and for a long time there was nothing out there. We were considering publishing one of our own, but then the Crystal Guide Pocket Edition hit the Play Store and after getting it and trying it out we decided to endorse it as a great addition to any smartphone or tablet for our customers, linking it to our website and sharing on our Facebook & Twitter accounts. We love that it provides both Science and Metaphysical Information with good pictures and the ability to search the entire App by multiple criteria. We also love the warnings about handling of minerals too, something we feel is often overlooked in other publications. Just a superb reference for the modern collector and buyer of Rocks, Minerals & Crystals!
reviews.author: Jeff Jessie

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: It\'s super for quick correct information. .
reviews.author: Anne Zee

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I really like all the information this app has and that you can make notes under each stone as well as creating a favorites list. It has nice reference lists that are scientific as well as for healing. I hope it gets more added on over time. I am not one to buy many apps but I am glad I bought this because it is like having a book in my phone.
reviews.author: Heather Dixon

reviews.title: Best!
reviews.comment: Most extensive and superior gemstone and crystal app out there.
reviews.author: Mina Rios

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: The only app I\'ll ever need for information on the physical AND metaphysical properties of crystals. Great job guys, this is overall one of the best designed reference apps I have on my phone regarding any subject whatsoever.
reviews.author: Daniel O\'Connor

reviews.title: Love this app!!!
reviews.comment: Very handy and well worth the few dollars I paid!! Thank you!!!
reviews.author: Jody Pollard

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Recommended. The best out there. Thanks a lot. \342\231\245 it
reviews.author: Luke Wise

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This is the app I\'ve been searching for. Many features, simple to use and just lovely. Well done! Worth every cent.
reviews.author: Spencer McGill

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: Better than I thought it would be! Only thing that could make it even better, is to have the option to add a stone to the catalogue.  A person can up load the information and have it correspond to the appropriate feilds that the application already has set in place.
reviews.author: Peter B

reviews.title: Really excellent guide
reviews.comment: This app has everything, definitely recommend to crystal lovers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautifully done \360\237\222\216
reviews.comment: Impressive selection of stones and diversity of information.     One issue: if I lose my internet connection I can\'t use it (just get a \"can\'t retrieve license\" notice).
reviews.author: Susan G

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Best crystals reference app by far. Comprehensive, great information, including geological as well as metaphysical. Regular updates are good too.
reviews.author: Denise McSpadden

reviews.title: Best on the market
reviews.comment: It was a bit of a challenge to get this app installed on my device, but I blame that on my oddball setup. Now that it\'s installed it\'s working fine, and the combo of this app plus its associated widget blows the other crystal apps I\'ve found out of the water, including Galaxy Crystals. There will always be more crystals that could be added, of course, plus it\'d be wonderful to be able to add our own notes as well.
reviews.author: Thea Beddes

reviews.title: Great stuff
reviews.comment: I love everything about this portable book. My go-to reference guide to it all!
reviews.author: Sherry Swecker

reviews.title: ****A MUST HAVE***
reviews.comment: I am beyond happy with this app. Thank you sooo much for making it!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Absolute Best
reviews.comment: Great app- so many features- outstanding! And it is always being improved and updated, very important. Love it!
reviews.author: Kristi Blair

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: A great reference to carry with you. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great reference!
reviews.comment: This is a great on the go reference. Works well on my s3, no problems so far.
reviews.author: Jaron Swab

reviews.title: Great multi use content
reviews.comment: This is the perfect app for discovery and education. I use this app first info and rarely need to hits the books for reference. I\'m purchasing the widget to support and can\'t wait for the crystal quiz app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app! =)
reviews.comment: Excellent app, has a lot of useful information and a comprehensive list of stones and crystals. I\'ve recommended this app to friends and am very pleased with it.
reviews.author: Marisa Marranzini
